name: STREET UNI X Kickstarter Demo
description:
Street Uni X is classic extreme sports gaming at it's best, on one wheel!

This is the PRE-ALPHA KICKSTARTER DEMO! That means it's not done yet! There will be more features, more playable characters, more levels, and less bugs as things move forward, as long as the kickstarter is successful!

So what are you waiting for?

CLICK HERE TO VISIT AND SUPPORT THE KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN!!!

FEATURING:
TRICKS! COMBOS! GOALS! COLLECTABLES! REAL PRO RIDERS! HIDDEN AREAS! NOSTALGIC AESTHETICS! TIGHT CONTROLS! A HIGH ENERGY SOUNDTRACK!

SOON TO FEATURE:
GAPS! UNLOCKABLE LEVELS! CHEAT CODES! SECRET CHARACTERS!

This game is EVERYTHING great about the PS1 and early PS2 era of extreme sports video games with one integral twist... it's about STREET UNICYCLING!!!

If you enjoyed the demo, and are craving more levels, more characters, more mechanics, and more game in general, then please consider SUPPORTING THE KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN

The success of the kickstarter campaign is integral to my ability to finish building this video game.

Gamepad with a comfy DPad STRONGLY recommended

Here are the keyboard controls if you don't have a gamepad:
WASD - Move
I / Num8 - Coast
J / Num4 - Flip Trick
K / Num5 - Jump
L / Num6  - Grab Trick
U / Num7 - Grind Left
O / Num9 - Grind Right
